#summary Use case for handling an "advanced" book search.
#labels Phase-Requirements,UseCase

= Introduction =

*Description:*

User searches for a book to purchase, using a combination of search criteria including author, title, ISBN, category, year and edition.

*Preconditions:*
 # The user knows at least one piece of information of the book he wants to search for.
 # The user is viewing the Advanced Search page.

*Postconditions:*
 # The user will be presented with a list of active book listings matching his search criteria.

= Basic Course of Action =
 # User wants to search for a book.
 # User enters the criteria to search for.
 # User submits the search form.
 # System searches the books database table for matches.
 # System returns a list of matched book listings to the user.
 # Use case ends.
